page: CE41015: Transients In Pipes And Open Channels

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Unsteady and transient flow analysis in pipe systems: water hammer: fundamental equations, elastics waves in conduits, boundary effects, numerical and graphical methods; other water conducting systems â surges in open channels and forebays; pressure transients in tunnels, penstocks and peripheral components (i.e., bends, reducers, branches, manifolds, anchor blocks); comparison of static and transient pressures in water conducting systems; Types and basic analysis through differential equations for surge tank, method of solution, simple, and differential surge tanks with expanded chambers; Pipe network analysis (steady state and transient); computer analysis and use of related programs.
page: CE41015: Transients In Pipes And Open Channels
